raw_comment: This graph shows how early and late spring comes in different areas. As the map starts, it gets closer and closer to the equator. This shows the change in the seasons of different areas. We notice a change in the map as it stops right at Montana and Wyoming. These indicate the states that have a colder temperature and longer winter than other states. We believe that this map is  great way of showing the seasons through out the states.
ace_sentences: The graph shows how early spring comes in different areas.
The graph shows how late spring comes in different areas.
The map starts at some area.
As the map starts, the map gets closer and closer to the equator.
This shows the change of the seasons in different areas.
We notice a change in the map.
These states have a colder temperature than other states.
These states have a longer winter than other states.
We believe that this map is a great way to show the seasons throughout the states.
